name: agent
content:
<!--zone_{ZONE}-->
  <WAREHOUSE LOCATION="<tkBookmark collection="perf" name="wpa"/>" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLO_LFAPROFILES" INTERVAL="5" RETAIN="1" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLO_LOG_FILE_REGEX_STATISTICS" INTERVAL="5" RETAIN="1" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLO_LOG_FILE_STATUS" INTERVAL="5" RETAIN="1" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS" INTERVAL="0" RETAIN="1" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLO_PERFORMANCE_OBJECT_STATUS" INTERVAL="5" RETAIN="1" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLO_PRO_PERFORMANCE_OBJECT_STATUS" INTERVAL="5" RETAIN="1" />
